label: 角筆
説明文: Stylus-impressed writing (kakuhitsu) is an ancient technique employing a chopstick-like stylus to incise or impress characters into the media surface, whether paper or wood.#[article]KOBAYASHI Yoshinori. Two Recently-discovered Stylus-impressed Manuscript Books and Their Value as Sources: New Material on the Murder of Matsuzaki Jū'emon, Senior Councilor of the Takamatsu Domain.
